BEIDSDK_API BEID_Certificate& eIDMW::BEID_Certificate::getChildren ( unsigned long  ulIndex  ) 

Return the children certificate (certificate that has been issued by this one).

Parameters:
ulIndex is the children index (the index for the first child is 0) Throw BEID_ExParamRange exception if the index is out of range
